info.name: NPCL Dashboard APIs
info.description:
Comprehensive API collection for NPCL Dashboard - A power management system with role-based authentication, voicebot call tracking, and dashboard analytics.

## Authentication
This API now supports both NextAuth.js (legacy) and custom JSON-based authentication endpoints:

### New JSON API Endpoints (Recommended)
- **Login**: POST /api/auth/login - Returns proper JSON responses
- **Logout**: POST /api/auth/logout - Returns JSON confirmation
- **Session Check**: GET /api/auth/login - Check authentication status
- **Signin**: POST /api/auth/signin - Credential validation only

### Legacy NextAuth.js Endpoints
- **Session**: GET /api/auth/session - NextAuth session info
- **Signout**: POST /api/auth/signout - Form-based logout (returns HTML)

## Base URL
Development: http://localhost:3000
Production: Set {{baseUrl}} variable accordingly

## Test Accounts
- Admin: admin@npcl.com / admin123
- Operator: operator@npcl.com / operator123
- Viewer: viewer@npcl.com / viewer123

## Updated Features
- **NEW**: JSON-based authentication API with proper responses
- Enhanced password validation (8+ chars, uppercase, lowercase, number, special char)
- Comprehensive user management endpoints
- Voicebot call reporting with filtering and export
- Health monitoring and system status
- Audit logging for all user actions
- Role-based access control (ADMIN, OPERATOR, VIEWER)
- Dual authentication system (NextAuth + Custom API)
